nodes.text: The Scissorfists Clan was a clan made up of former escaped slaves on the planet Dathomir. It was named after the Scissorfist, a large crustacean found on the planet. The Scissorfists feuded with the Blue Coral Divers Clan, another clan that lived near the sea. After years of fighting, both clans tried to settle their differences through a diplomatic meeting. However, the peace talks ended badly and both clans resumed their feud.
